title: Node.js: Promise Basics
story: Promises are the foundation of async JavaScript. They represent future values!
instructions: Create a Promise that resolves with the value 'Success!' after using Promise.resolve(). Use .then() to print the result.

hints.text: Promise.resolve(value) creates a promise that immediately resolves with that value.
Use .then(callback) to handle the resolved value: promise.then(result => console.log(result))
